source.014bbf18: ## Graph for Estimated Salary of Customers
source.53c4c36c: Logistic Regression is a classification algorithm and not a regression algorithm. It is used to estimate discrete values (like 0 or 1, True or False, Yes or No) based on a given set of independent variables.
source.b120c5db: Logistic Regression produces results in a binary format that is used to predict the outcome of a categorical dependent variable. So the outcome should be discrete/categorical.
source.529ef2bd:
## Dataset

We will be using a simple dataset to implement this algorithm. This dataset contains Head Size (cm^3) and Brain Weight (grams) columns where Head Size is an independent variable.

Download the dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/iamaniket/suv-data).
